objects.specification: A seamless light-colored floor surface with a smooth finish. The tone is soft and reflects ambient light evenly, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere. The material has a subtle matte texture ideal for a classroom setting.
A tall, flat indoor wall painted in a crisp white shade. The surface is uniform and matte to minimize glare. The thickness is slight, providing structural definition without bulk.
A tall, flat indoor wall painted in a crisp white shade. The surface is uniform and matte to minimize glare. The thickness is slight, providing structural definition without bulk.

A large rectangular teacher’s desk with a darker wood grain finish. The surface is broad and smooth, with visible organic wood textures. The edges are softly rounded for safety, and the legs are sturdy square posts matching the dark tone.

A comfortable teacher’s chair with a warm complementary fabric cushion. The frame has a medium wood tone that contrasts gently with the cushion. The backrest is supportive and slightly curved, mounted on four tapered legs.
A large rectangular blackboard with a matte dark surface and subtle green undertone. It has a thin wooden trim frame in a medium wood finish. The surface is smooth for chalk writing.
A compact student desk with a light wood tone. The rectangular top has subtle grain patterns and rounded corners. The support legs are slender and match the desktop’s light finish.
A simple student chair with a complementary colored molded seat and back. The frame has a light metal finish and four straight legs. The seat contours slightly for ergonomic support.

A modern recessed ceiling light fixture with a clean white housing. The diffuser is frosted glass, spreading even bright illumination without harsh hotspots.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a medium wood finish, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful books. The surface has a subtle grain texture, and the back panel is painted in a complementary light tone.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panels framed in white. Soft fabric curtains in a light neutral color hang on either side, slightly draped for a casual look. The frame is slim and modern.
A circular wall clock with a thin black frame and a white face. The hour markings are simple black lines, and the hands are slender and contrasting. The design is minimalist and easy to read.
A colorful educational poster featuring charts and diagrams. The print has a glossy finish and a simple white border. The imagery is bright and informative.

A lush green potted plant with broad leaves. The pot is simple ceramic in a neutral tone, and the foliage is full and vibrant. The textures vary from smooth ceramic to natural leaf veins.
A compact waste bin made of dark gray plastic. The walls are smooth with a slightly glossy finish. The shape is cylindrical with a gently tapered bottom.
